name: LOC Documentation
description: User documentation for Logic Operating Centre (LOC)
tooltip: The official user guide website for FST Network's cloud native data integration platform, Logic Operating Centre (LOC). It has a main product docs for general users and two SDK docs (JavaScript/Typescript and C#) for professional developers.

name: Product White Paper Copywriting
tooltip: Write and organize product white paper drafts for XREX Exchange's several cryptocurrency-related FinTech products (Spot Trading, Margin Trading, Secured Loan, XREX/DeFi Staking, BitCheck, Deposit/Withdraw) based on materials and screenshots provided by the product team. These are for mandatory disclosure and regulatory compliance purposes.
